name: Tuya Zigbee 3.0 Hub/Wired POE Gateway for Tuya Devices, APP Control, Voice Control, Work with Tuya/Smart Life App, Smart Wired Bridge Compatible with Alexa, Google Home Assistant, IFTTT, Zigbee2MQTT
short_description: [Please Note] Support zigbee2MQTT and IFTTT. This POE Zigbee gateway needs to configure network before using remote APP control and voice control. When configuring the network, the cell phone and the gateway should be in the same network, only 2.4GHz WiFi is supported, 5GHz WiFi is not supported. Distance between sub-device and gateway to ensure stable control: 35m indoors, 265m outdoors.

[Zigbee POE Gateway/Bridge] It has one USB Type C port and one PoE port (Ethernet port). It can be powered by USB only or PoE. When using PoE power supply, you need to use it with a PoE switch (sold separately), and the Ethernet port not only transmits signals but also supplies power at the same time. It is not limited by installation location. This all-in-one design makes wiring and installation of the device easier and more flexible, while reducing maintenance costs and complexity.

[Wired Zigbee Gateway] Zigbee devices are added to the network through this gateway to realize the communication with other devices, the gateway is connected to the router through the network cable to realize the communication with the cloud and the cell phone APP, through the App you can view and control the zigbee devices.

[One-click Networking] When the sub-device is in the state of pending network allocation, it can support multiple sub-devices to enter the network at the same time, no need to add sub-devices one by one, and it can also support adding sub-devices in the environment of no network.

[Sub-device Anti-Mistake Deletion] Under normal use, there is a sub-device mistakenly touched causing the device to be reset, and if the sub-device does not carry out the distribution operation during this period, the device will be automatically linked to the original gateway device after 3 minutes.

[Fast Control of Scene/Multicast] Under normal operation, it supports large-scale network broadcasting, more than 100+ devices are online at the same time, and it works stably. The device can support local scene/linkage, and support cross-gateway linkage under the state of networking.

[Application Scenario] Tuya zigbee PoE wired gateway supports devices across the industry in the field of electricians, lighting, sensors, home appliances, etc., and with the expansion of Tuya smart devices and real-time updates, can easily realize the sub-node devices within the scene of the linkage and remote, voice control.
